text: khanditavagiyu phirâ€Œaunanu bhumiyalli vidroha merediddanu mattu bhuvasigalannu pangadagalagi vingadisiddanu. Avanu avarallina ondu pangadavannu durbalagolisi avara putrara koralu koydu biduttiddanu hagu avara mahileyarannu matra jivantaviduttiddanu. Khanditavagiyu avanu asanti habbuvavanagiddanu
